text: Nagaoka may refer to: ==Places== * Nagaoka, Niigata, Japan * Nagaoka-kyō, the capital of Japan from 784 to 794 ** Nagaokakyō, Kyoto, Japan, a city at the location of Nagaoka-kyō * Izunagaoka, Shizuoka, Japan, a former town in Izu Peninsula ==People with the surname== *, Japanese footballer *, Japanese physicist responsible for the 1904 "Saturnian" model of atomic structure *, Japanese ski jumper *, Japanese women's basketball player *, Japanese volleyball player *, Japanese illustrator *, Japanese speed skater *, Japanese shogi player ==Other uses== *Nagaoka (crater), a lunar crater named after Hantaro Nagaoka
title: Nagaoka
